sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const RefundPolicyPage = () => { return (

Return and Refund Policy for PMP® Certification Exam Prep Training by Edzest

Thank you for choosing Edzest Education Services for your PMP® certification exam preparation.

We are dedicated to delivering top-quality online services to support your success in the PMP® certification journey.

Please carefully review our return and refund policy:

Returns:

Given the nature of our online services, returns are not applicable once you have accessed our training materials or participated in any online sessions.

Refunds:

  1. Contact us: Initiate your refund request by sending an email to contact@edzest.org or reach out via phone/WhatsApp at +91 9673332684. Ensure that you provide your full name, contact information, and the reason for the refund request.
  2. Approval process: Our team will carefully review your request and may request additional information if needed. Refund requests are assessed on a case-by-case basis.
  3. Notification: You will receive an email notification regarding the approval or denial of your refund request. If approved, the email will contain further instructions on the refund process.
  4. Refund processing: Upon approval, your refund will be processed promptly. The refund will be issued within 7 days after the refund has been approved upon discussion.

Contact Information:

For any inquiries or concerns regarding our return and refund policy, please reach out to us at contact@edzest.org.

By utilizing our services, you agree to adhere to the terms and conditions specified in this return and refund policy.

Edzest Education Services

Contact: contact@edzest.org

Date: February 2, 2024

); }; export default RefundPolicyPage;
